content.html:
How does this work?

Tap an item to swap

between retailers

Try CartHacks

for recommendations to unlock free shipping

Easily check out

with each retailer using your own accounts

Ok, got it

inboxMetadata.title: Tips and tricks 1
inboxMetadata.subtitle: Hi {{firstName}}, learn to make the most out of your Popcart experience!
